context.title: Changelog for Rule: HTML page `lang` and `xml:lang` attributes have matching values
context.changelog: [{"commit":"4e85f969664aa3439075967c481db6bfc1ea86c6","msg":"Updating rule name(s) and filename(s) (#943)","date":"1569413997"},{"commit":"e87fa0696963a2a7f950b35712cc93d9afb56dd7","msg":"fix: update links to WCAG21 resources (#776)","date":"1566375576"},{"commit":"1ae0c47454fefde325bb2852c0393c5023f81194","msg":"Correct explanatory text of examples (#660)","date":"1562742294"},{"commit":"59456c3561ae35293c30a7d9120aa1f291a2ae91","msg":"Bugfix closing svg tag (#657)","date":"1562678603"},{"commit":"c9a3f5dd61e126b8632714dfc59718f3ab7666b8","msg":"Glossary and Rule update: Replacing \"non-empty\" definition (#430)","date":"1557910722"},{"commit":"d0848acd83b5841564409f04f5cf4da7072a173c","msg":"Template update - HTML lang and xml:lang match (#511)","date":"1557262588"},{"commit":"77b75c40f635e8ac612d83e9c4ef4aa883a6ddac","msg":"Fix: testcase generation (#296)","date":"1539074727"},{"commit":"8be66ec17013a88d799c8e512ab352db8af8e94c","msg":"Update name of html-xml-lang-match rule (#279)","date":"1538498262"},{"commit":"8f5b2955b4c4d801c789eefdbf48f0ac93c2305c","msg":"fix: links in background were not anchors (#187)","date":"1531472363"},{"commit":"3ec9ec6493c988f6d59040e3a0d551c7edf1ae4c","msg":"FINAL: SC3-1-1-html-xml-lang-match (#96)","date":"1530002738"}]
context.fastmatterAttributes: {"id":"5b7ae0","name":"HTML page `lang` and `xml:lang` attributes have matching values","rule_type":"atomic","description":"This rule checks that all HTML pages with both a `lang` and `xml:lang` attributes on the root element, have the same primary language subtag.\n","accessibility_requirements":{"wcag20:3.1.1":{"forConformance":true,"failed":"not satisfied","passed":"further testing needed","inapplicable":"further testing needed"}},"input_aspects":["DOM Tree"],"authors":["Annika Nietzio","Jey Nandakumar"]}
